execution_quality: Generally competent with some issues—the agent successfully structured the implementation across files but introduced bugs (escape key handling and formatting) that required immediate user corrections.
work_category: Feature implementation with multi-file coordination. Agent implemented a CRT profile flag and in-game profile switching system by modifying multiple QML files and configuration code.
summary: The agent executed a complex multi-file feature implementation with reasonable independence but introduced functional bugs (escape key and formatting) that were caught immediately by the user. The core structure appears correct but the implementation needs iteration to fix these issues, indicating the feature isn't yet production-ready despite appearing complete.
follow_up_pattern: User reports two specific bugs/issues that need fixing rather than acceptance of complete work. This indicates the feature has functional problems that need iteration.
